org.assertj.swing.driver

Class JAppletDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.swing.driver.ComponentDriver
      • org.assertj.swing.driver.JAppletDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppletStub

    @InternalApi
public class JAppletDriver
extends ComponentDriver
implements AppletStub

    Supports functional testing of JApplets.

    Note: This class is intended for internal use only. Please use the classes in the package org.assertj.swing.fixture in your tests.

    Author:
    Mel Llaguno, Alex Ruiz
